application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: 118-122 King's Road and 7-9 Tryon Street, LONDON
description: Details required by Condition 15(a) (Noise survey and report) of planning permission PP/21/02928 (Variation of condition 2 (Compliance with approved drawings) of planning permission 20/04157 (Demolition of existing above ground buildings and structures at 118 -122 King's Road, including the King's Walk Shopping Mall and 7 - 9 Tryon Street and replacement with a five storey building (ground, plus three upper floors and a set-back roof) with retention and refurbishment of existing basement and lower ground levels and rear ground floor area to provide retail (Class A1 and / or A3), office (Class B1) and non-residential institution/leisure (Class D1/ D2) uses, the creation of a new shared surface on Tryon Street, and associated parking, landscaping and public realm improvements). The variation seeks minor alterations to the approved rear massing, green roof and roof level arrangements and minor associated design changes')
